numbered_ace_sentences: 1. In the graph, players of color are much more numerous than coaches of color.
2. The difference between players of color and coaches of color is extreme.
3. I wonder why this difference is so large.
4. I wonder how we can encourage more people of color to become involved.
5. I want the statistic to become more equal.
6. This situation can cause many people to form different views about people of color.
7. Some people may think that people of color are lazy because of the low involvement.
8. Some people may think that people of color are unauthentic because of the low involvement.
9. This situation can also suggest that people of color do not have enough knowledge to be involved in sports.
10. The headline is: How has the involvement of people of color evolved through the year 2020?
